meanings.definition: A person to whom property or rights are transferred.
meanings.sent1: The alienees received the house as a gift.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer explained the rights of the alienees.
meanings.sent3: The alienees were thrilled to inherit the beautiful estate.
meanings.sent4: The property deed passed to the alienees like a baton in a relay race.
meanings.sent5: The alienees eagerly awaited their new ownership responsibilities.
